name: picky
description: ios app for “wish lists”; private, not public but you can share the wish lists; casual, friendly, bubbly, emoji and glassmorphism, ethereal glow motifs. Can source all inputted items on the web for different sizes/related items and better prices, maybe use AI / embeddings / web search to fuel innovative new shopping experiences? Can differentiate between “need” and “want” and other tags you create. ai-native shopping app with wish lists as the fundamental currency; instinctive ui/ux that fuels seamless product discovery and wishlist management. automations possibly, suggested automations possible? ai driven insights to save money on things you like or things you buy often, or good deals on things you would like? basically the best way to buy things in 2025

coreTechnicalNeeds: Web scraping and product information retrieval library
core: AI/ML libraries for product analysis and recommendations
Image processing library for emoji and glassmorphism effects
optional: Natural language processing library for tag creation and automation suggestions

keyInteractions: Adding and editing wish list items
interactions: Visually appealing design with emoji and glassmorphism elements
design: Emphasis on visual browsing and discovery

apis: E-commerce APIs for product information and price comparisons
services: Cloud storage for wish lists and user data
AI/ML services for product analysis and recommendations
integrations: Potential integration with social media platforms for sharing wish lists

requiredAiFeatures: Image recognition for emoji and glassmorphism effects
required: Natural language processing for tag creation and automation suggestions
potential: Personalized shopping recommendations based on user preferences and purchase history
Predictive analysis for anticipating user needs and wants

reasons: Emphasizes novel solutions and cutting-edge technology (AI, embeddings, web search).
Focuses on innovative shopping experiences and AI-driven insights.
Aims to be the 'best way to buy things in 2025,' suggesting a groundbreaking approach.
secondaryTypes: Further explore the integration of AI and web search for product discovery and price comparison.
Investigate the feasibility and user experience of 'need' vs. 'want' differentiation and automated suggestions.
Consider potential ethical concerns and user privacy issues related to AI-driven insights and personalized recommendations.

insights.title: Enhanced group buying experiences through social and collaboration features
insights.description: Picky could deepen its integration with social media platforms and implement collaboration features to enable group buying experiences. This would allow users to easily share their interests and preferences with friends and family, discover new products together, and make joint purchases.
implications: Potential for virality and increased brand awareness
recommendations: Explore partnerships with social media platforms
Develop features for group creation and sharing
Implement collaborative buying tools and functionalities
Leverage social proof and recommendations to influence purchase decisions

insights.title: Personalized and dynamic product recommendations using AI
insights.description: Picky could leverage artificial intelligence to analyze user behavior, preferences, and purchase history to generate personalized product recommendations. This would enhance the shopping experience for users by providing them with relevant and tailored suggestions, reducing decision fatigue and increasing satisfaction.
recommendations: Implement AI algorithms for product recommendation
Collect and analyze user data to personalize recommendations
Integrate AI-powered features into the user interface
Monitor and optimize the performance of recommendation algorithms

insights.title: Immersive product visualization through augmented reality
insights.description: Picky could incorporate augmented reality features to allow users to virtually interact with products in their own environment. This would provide a more immersive and interactive shopping experience, enabling users to visualize products in their homes or on themselves before making a purchase.
recommendations: Integrate AR features into the mobile app
Provide educational content on using AR features

insights.title: Increased user engagement through gamification and rewards
insights.description: Picky could introduce gamification elements and reward systems to incentivize user engagement and loyalty. This could include points, badges, leaderboards, and other rewards for completing tasks, sharing products, or making purchases.
implications: Potential for viral marketing and user-generated content
recommendations: Implement gamification features and reward systems
Design engaging challenges and tasks for users
Provide incentives and rewards for desired behaviors
Monitor and adjust the program based on user feedback

risks: Privacy concerns related to data collection
Technical challenges of implementing AR features
Potential for user fatigue with gamification
opportunities: Becoming a leading social commerce platform
Driving innovation in the e-commerce industry

insights.response: deeper integrations with socials and collaboration features for group buying experiences
